item.description:
Hi,

I have three tee times starting at 11:40am this Saturday, Oct 1st.  Fees with cart are $67 ($50 if walking).  They do have a driving range although I couldn't find it posted on their website.  Its an easy course to get to about 34 min from downtown Boston (93n to exit 46 - first right in the rotary then immediately bear right (before the light) onto Route 113 WEST DRACUT - about 2 miles on the left.
item.how_to_find_us: around the clubhouse or a tthe driving range prior to tee time

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Hickory Hill
